title: Take a look 2
creator_credit: TV Ontario and Milton van der Veen
brief_description: Set in the country, this series takes a hands-on approach to the principles of science. Kate returns in this series with a new friend, Jamie, and together they explore the natural environment. Kate teaches Jamie about plant and animal life, basic astronomy, geology and meteorology. They experiment with household items and investigate the principles that underly everyday occurrences.
